message.content:
cs.LG, cs.MA, cs.IR, cs.CE, cs.SI 

This paper uses machine learning algorithms to construct prediction models based on at-home advertisement exposure time and demographic data to examine the predictability of actual purchase and purchase intention behaviors of customers. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning). Other likely sub-categories include cs.MA (Multi-Agent Systems) as the study involves analyzing the behavior of customers, cs.IR (Information Retrieval) as the study involves analyzing the effectiveness of advertising, cs.CE (Computational Economics) as the study involves analyzing the impact of advertising on purchase behavior, and cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) as the study involves analyzing the influence of social media and new information technologies on advertising.
